[[inst_sd_smax]]
==== SD.SMAX

*Syntax:* sd.smax<.{rl, f, rlf}> [SrcL], SrcR

*Description:* Atomic Signed Max operation: memory value is atomically signed maxed with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_sd_smax.svg[SD.SMAX encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
